name: Fighter Resistance
description:
CONTROLS

W - Move

A and D - Rotate

F or LMB - Fire 

SPACE - Drop Flares

In this three hour indie game, you'll take on the role of a fighter jet pilot on a mission to destroy the remaining pockets of enemy air resistance. With fast-paced gameplay and challenging levels, you'll need to use your skills and strategic thinking to outmaneuver enemy aircraft and emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate fighter pilot and save the day?

(PS : It is my first ever official game release c: )
